Summary._: [1] [2] [3] [N] [R] [Q] [W] and [7] trains are bypassing Times Sq-42 St in both directions, [A] [C] and [E] trains are bypassing 42 St/Port Authotiy.

Description._:
[A] [C] and [E] trains are bypassing 42 St/Port Authority-Bus Terminal in both directions.

[1] [2] [3] [N] [Q] [R] [W] and [7] trains has resumed making station stops at Times Sq-42 St with delays.

[S] 42 St shuttle train service has resumed.

Expect delays on [A] [B] [C] [E] [L] and [M] train service in both directions.

These service changes are because of an NYPD investigation at 42 St/Port Authority-Bus Terminal.

LongDescription:
[A] [C] and [E] trains are bypassing 42 St/Port Authority-Bus Terminal in both directions.
[1] [2] [3] [N] [Q] [R] [W] and [7] trains has resumed making station stops at Times Sq-42 St with delays.
[S] 42 St shuttle train service has resumed.
Expect delays on [A] [B] [C] [E] [L] and [M] train service in both directions.
These service changes are because of an NYPD investigation at 42 St/Port Authority-Bus Terminal.
